name: Spore Hero
description:
Spore finally comes to Wii in this all-new adventure. Create your own creature hero and fight to save your planet. From Raptor Rams to Shark Tanks you can make your hero any way you like. What kind of hero will you create? This all-new story begins as you crash land on a strange alien world. But something evil has followed you and is threatening to destroy the creatures of the planet. Only a true hero can save the world from this new threat! Earn unique new parts to adapt your hero for courageous battles and amazing adventures.

• CREATE and evolve your own hero with over 250 collectable parts and special abilities. Spore’s revolutionary Creature Creator is brought to life with Wii controls!
• FIGHT using your Wii Remote as you spit poison, fire spikes, dive bomb, and bite your enemies! Unlock combos and new fighting skills as you take on dangerous creatures all over the planet!
• PLAY against a friend as you bring your wildest Spore creatures into battle in versus multiplayer action!
• EXPLORE a vast new world filled with hidden parts, thrilling quests, and more in this new Spore Adventure!
